title: Active site switching on high entropy phosphides as bifunctional oxygen electrocatalysts for rechargeable/robust Zn-Air battery
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01912A, Paper
Ren He, Shiqi Wang, Linlin Yang, Sharona Horta, Yang Ding, Chong Di, Xuesong Zhang, Ying Xu, Maria Iba√±ez, Yingtang Zhou, Stefan Mebs, Holger Dau, Jan Niklas Hausmann, Wenyi Huo, Prashanth W. Menezes, Andreu Cabot
High-entropy materials (HEMs) offering a quasi-continuous spectrum of active sites have generated great expectations in fields such as electrocatalysis and energy storage. Despite their potential, the complex composition and associated...
